title: Inception
caption: A thief who enters dreams to steal secrets is given a final job: plant an idea.

title: The Godfather
caption: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
caption: Batman must face the chaos unleashed by the Joker in Gotham City.

title: Pulp Fiction
caption: The lives of two hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of bandits intertwine in four tales of violence.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
caption: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption.

title: Fight Club
caption: An insomniac and a soap salesman form an underground fight club.

title: Forrest Gump
caption: The story of Forrest, a simple man with a big heart living through pivotal moments of history.

title: The Matrix
caption: A computer hacker discovers the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
caption: A young hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: Interstellar
caption: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity’s survival.

title: Gladiator
caption: A former Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Prestige
caption: Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry to create the ultimate illusion.

title: The Departed
caption: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other in Boston’s criminal underworld.

title: Whiplash
caption: A determined jazz drummer endures the abusive teaching of an instructor.

title: The Lion King
caption: A young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility.

title: Inglourious Basterds
caption: In Nazi-occupied France, a group of Jews plan to assassinate Nazi leaders.

title: Django Unchained
caption: A freed slave teams up with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a plantation owner.

title: The Social Network
caption: The founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed its success.

title: Se7en
caption: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as motives.

title: Avatar
caption: A paraplegic marine is sent to Pandora on a mission, but becomes torn between two worlds.
